member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase
member.summary: A base class for Blazor components.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Attributes
member.summary: A collection of attributes that will be merged onto the component when rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Builder
member.summary: The builder that will be used to build attributes, classes and styles for the element produced by the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.ChildContent
member.summary: Enables child content for the control.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Classes
member.summary: Returns a read-only copy of the classes defined on the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Styles
member.summary: Returns a read-only copy of the inline styles defined on the component.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.SetParametersAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ParameterView)
member.summary: Prepares the component for parameters.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddAttribute(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the dictionary.
member.param: The name of the attribute to add.
The value of the attribute.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddClasses(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the given classes to the collection.
member.param: An array of class names to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddStyle(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a style to the style dictionary. The style dictionary will be rendered as an inline style attribute on the resulting element.
member.param: The name of the style.
The value of the style.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.OnParametersSet
member.summary: Handles builders set on the component.
member.remarks: If you override this method, you must call the base implementation at some point in your implementation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the attribute with the given name.
member.param: The name of the attribute to remove.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveClass(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given class from the collection.
member.param: The class name to remove.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveStyle(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given style from the styles dictionary.
member.param: The style to remove.

member.summary: Returns the attributes from the builder.

member.summary: Returns the classes from the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.BuildStyles
member.summary: Returns the styles from the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.AddAttribute(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the builder.

The value of the attribute.
member.remarks: If the attribute already exists, it will be overwritten.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.AddAttributes(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Adds multiple attributes to the builder.
member.param: A dictionary representing the attributes to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.AddClasses(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the given classes to the builder.
member.param: The classes to add. Duplicates and classes that already exist are ignored.

member.summary: Adds a CSS style to the builder.
member.param: The name of the style.
The value of the style.
member.remarks: If the style already exists, it will be overwritten.

member.summary: Adds multiple styles to the builder.
member.param: A dictionary representing the styles to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.RemoveAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given attribute from the builder.
member.param: The name of the attribute to remove.
member.remarks: If the attribute does not exist, the call will be ignored.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.RemoveClasses(System.String[])
member.summary: Removes the given classes from the builder.
member.param: The classes to remove.
member.remarks: If a class does not exist, it will be ignored.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ComponentBuilder.RemoveStyle(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given style from the builder.
member.param: The name of the style to remove.
member.remarks: If the style does not exist, it is ignored.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect
member.summary: Allows you to redirect the user to another address.
member.remarks: This component handles the redirection when it is rendered. No redirection will occur if your application logic does not render this component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect.Delay
member.summary: A delay in milliseconds before redirecting to the specified URL.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect.Url
member.summary: The URL to redirect to when the component has rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect.NavigationManager
member.summary: The navigation manager used by the component. This is automatically injected.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal
member.summary: Represents a modal dialog that is shown when the application looses connection with the server.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.BackdropBackgroundColor
member.summary: The colour of the modal dialog backdrop. Defaults to rgba(0, 0, 0, .75).

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.ConnectionStateBackgroundColor
member.summary: The background colour of the dialog displaying the connection state. Defaults to rgba(255, 255, 255, .8).

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.ConnectionStatePadding
member.summary: The padding for the modal displaying the connection state. Default to 64px.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.ReconnectingTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to customize the message that is shown when the connection is lost and the application is trying to reconnect.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.ReconnectFailedTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to customize the message that is shown when reconnection attempts with the server have failed.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Server.ComponentReconnectModal.ReconnectRejectedTemplate
member.summary: Allows you to customize the message that is shown when the server has rejected the reconnection.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackArgs
member.summary: An arguments class for use when calling a JavaScript function from .NET, where the JavaScript function needs to call back to your .NET code.
member.remarks: This is useful in scenarios where the JavaScript function that you call from .NET calls into some JavaScript API that returns a result using callback functions.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackArgs.SuccessCallback
member.summary: The callback method that will be called from JavaScript when the operation completes successfully.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackArgs.FailureCallback
member.summary: The callback method that will be called from JavaScript when the operation fails.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackArgs.Data
member.summary: Arbitrary data to pass in to the JavaScript function.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackArgs.Dispose
member.summary: Handles disposing of objects.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2
member.summary: Handles callbacks to and from JavaScript code.
member.remarks: For details on how to use this class, see the wiki at https://github.com/Blazorade/Blazorade-Core/wiki/DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.#ctor(Microsoft.JSInterop.IJSObjectReference,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: The module declaring the JavaScript function to call.
The identifier (name) of the function to call.
Optional data to pass to the JavaScript function. This will be available on the property in the called JavaScript function.
member.remarks: This class assumes that the JavaScript function defined by takes one parameter that is represented by an instance of the class. That instance defines a success callback and a failure callback. The called JavaScript function is assumed to call either of those to return data.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.#ctor(Microsoft.JSInterop.IJSRuntime,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: The JavaScript runtime to use when calling a JavaScript function.
The identifier (name) of the function to call.
Optional data to pass to the JavaScript function. This will be available on the property in the called JavaScript function.
member.remarks: This class assumes that the JavaScript function defined by takes one parameter that is represented by an instance of the class. That instance defines a success callback and a failure callback. The called JavaScript function is assumed to call either of those to return data.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.SuccessCallbackAsync(`0)
member.summary: The method that will be called by JavaScript code when the operation completes successfully.
member.remarks: This method supports the functionality provided by the class and should not be used in your code.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.FailureCallbackAsync(`1)
member.summary: The method that will be called by JavaSCript code when the operation fails.
member.remarks: This method supports the functionality provided by the class and should not be used in your code.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.GetResultAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Calls the JavaScript function specified when the class instance was created. The returned by this method will complete when the called JavaScript function calls one of the callbacks sent as argument.
member.param: The timeout in milliseconds to wait for a call on either success or failure callbacks from the called JavaScript.
member.exception: The exception that is thrown if your JavaScript code calls the failureCallback callback. The property will contain the argument that your JavaScript code send to the callback.
The exception that is thrown if the method call times out, i.e. the called JavaScript has not called either success or failure callbacks.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the handler when it has been used.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceCallbackHandler`2.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Disposes of the handler when it has been used.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceMethod
member.summary: Encapsulates a .NET instance method in your Blazor application that can be called from JavaScript.

remarks.para: An instance of this class can be used as argument when calling a JavaScript function from .NET. The argument allows the JS code to call the .NET method encapsulated in this instance.
To call the method encapsulated in this instance from your JavaScript code, you pass this instance to your JavaScript code as an argument. In that JavaScript function you would then use it like this.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceMethod.Target
member.summary: Represents the target object defining the method to call back from JavaScript.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceMethod.MethodName
member.summary: The name of the method on the object represented by .

member.summary: Creates a new instance from the delegate specified in .
member.param: The method to encapsulate in the callback.

member.summary: Creates a new instance from the async function specified in .
member.param: The method to encapsulate in the callback.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Interop.DotNetInstanceMethod.Create``1(System.Func{``0,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Creates a new instance from the async function specified in .
member.typeparam: The type for the input parameter on the callback method.
member.param: The method to encapsulate in the callback.

member.summary: Disposes of the object.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Services.BlazoradeInteropServiceBase.ImportJavaScriptModuleAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the JavaScript module with the given URL.

param.name: moduleUrl
param.para: The relative or absolute path of the module to import.
If you are importing a JavaScript file in your component library's wwwroot folder, set the URL to ./content/{Library Name}/yourfile.js
